basics.label: Finance Director
basics.summary: Results oriented, dependable and motivated professional with 15 years of various experience in the field of accounting, payroll, tax, procurement and administration. Desires a challenging role in business processes.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage all aspects of accounting operations, overseeing day to day transactions related to general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepares financial statement of regional headquarters. Consolidates financial statement of companies and reports to the higher management.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepare invoices and follow-up on payments. Prepare payments to vendors. Prepare tax returns and other regulatory reports Process payroll.

skills.name: Accounting
keywords: Proficiency in Oracle Financials, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Dynamics, Peach Tree Accounting

professionalAffiliations.name: Philippine Institute of Certified Public Accountants (PIPCA)
